content: 1 Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ by God’s will, to the saints and faithful in Christ Jesus who are at Ephesus.
content_old: 1 Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ by God’s will, to the saints and faithful in Christ Jesus who are at Ephesus.

content: 2 Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 2 Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenlies in Christ;
content_old: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenlies in Christ;

content: 4 according as he has chosen us in him before the world’s foundation, that we should be holy and blameless before him in love;
content_old: 4 according as he has chosen us in him before the world’s foundation, that we should be holy and blameless before him in love;

content: 5 having marked us out beforehand for adoption through Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,
content_old: 5 having marked us out beforehand for adoption through Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

content: 6 to the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he has taken us into favour in the Beloved:
content_old: 6 to the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he has taken us into favour in the Beloved:

content: 7 in whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of offences, according to the riches of his grace;
content_old: 7 in whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of offences, according to the riches of his grace;

content: 8 which he has caused to abound towards us in all wisdom and intelligence,
content_old: 8 which he has caused to abound towards us in all wisdom and intelligence,

content: 9 having made known to us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he purposed in himself
content_old: 9 having made known to us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he purposed in himself

content: 10 for the administration of the fulness of times; to head up all things in the Christ, the things in the heavens and the things upon the earth; in him,
content_old: 10 for the administration of the fulness of times; to head up all things in the Christ, the things in the heavens and the things upon the earth; in him,

content: 11 in whom we have also obtained an inheritance, being marked out beforehand according to the purpose of him who works all things according to the counsel of his own will,
content_old: 11 in whom we have also obtained an inheritance, being marked out beforehand according to the purpose of him who works all things according to the counsel of his own will,

content: 12 that we should be to the praise of his glory who have pre-trusted in the Christ:
content_old: 12 that we should be to the praise of his glory who have pre-trusted in the Christ:

content: 13 in whom ye also have trusted, having heard the word of the truth, the glad tidings of your salvation; in whom also, having believed, ye have been sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise,
content_old: 13 in whom ye also have trusted, having heard the word of the truth, the glad tidings of your salvation; in whom also, having believed, ye have been sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise,

content: 14 who is the earnest of our inheritance to the redemption of the acquired possession to the praise of his glory.
content_old: 14 who is the earnest of our inheritance to the redemption of the acquired possession to the praise of his glory.

content: 15 Wherefore I also, having heard of the faith in the Lord Jesus which is in you, and the love which ye have towards all the saints,
content_old: 15 Wherefore I also, having heard of the faith in the Lord Jesus which is in you, and the love which ye have towards all the saints,

content: 16 do not cease giving thanks for you, making mention of you at my prayers,
content_old: 16 do not cease giving thanks for you, making mention of you at my prayers,

content: 17 that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, would give you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the full knowledge of him,
content_old: 17 that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, would give you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the full knowledge of him,

content: 18 being enlightened in the eyes of your heart, so that ye should know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
content_old: 18 being enlightened in the eyes of your heart, so that ye should know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

content: 19 and what the surpassing greatness of his power towards us who believe, according to the working of the might of his strength,
content_old: 19 and what the surpassing greatness of his power towards us who believe, according to the working of the might of his strength,

content: 20 in which he wrought in the Christ in raising him from among the dead, and he set him down at his right hand in the heavenlies,
content_old: 20 in which he wrought in the Christ in raising him from among the dead, and he set him down at his right hand in the heavenlies,

content: 21 above every principality, and authority, and power, and dominion, and every name named, not only in this age, but also in that to come;
content_old: 21 above every principality, and authority, and power, and dominion, and every name named, not only in this age, but also in that to come;

content: 22 and has put all things under his feet, and gave him to be head over all things to the assembly,
content_old: 22 and has put all things under his feet, and gave him to be head over all things to the assembly,

content: 1 and you, being dead in your offences and sins—
content_old: 1 and you, being dead in your offences and sins—

content: 2 in which ye once walked according to the age of this world, according to the ruler of the authority of the air, the spirit who now works in the sons of disobedience:
content_old: 2 in which ye once walked according to the age of this world, according to the ruler of the authority of the air, the spirit who now works in the sons of disobedience:

content: 3 among whom we also all once had our conversation in the lusts of our flesh, doing what the flesh and the thoughts willed to do, and were children, by nature, of wrath, even as the rest:
content_old: 3 among whom we also all once had our conversation in the lusts of our flesh, doing what the flesh and the thoughts willed to do, and were children, by nature, of wrath, even as the rest:

content: 4 but God, being rich in mercy, because of his great love wherewith he loved us,
content_old: 4 but God, being rich in mercy, because of his great love wherewith he loved us,

content: 5 (we too being dead in offences,) has quickened us with the Christ, (ye are saved by grace,)
content_old: 5 (we too being dead in offences,) has quickened us with the Christ, (ye are saved by grace,)

content: 6 and has raised us up together, and has made us sit down together in the heavenlies in Christ Jesus,
content_old: 6 and has raised us up together, and has made us sit down together in the heavenlies in Christ Jesus,

content: 7 that he might display in the coming ages the surpassing riches of his grace in kindness towards us in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 7 that he might display in the coming ages the surpassing riches of his grace in kindness towards us in Christ Jesus.

content: 8 For ye are saved by grace, through faith; and this not of yourselves; it is God’s gift:
content_old: 8 For ye are saved by grace, through faith; and this not of yourselves; it is God’s gift:

content: 9 not on the principle of works, that no one might boast.
content_old: 9 not on the principle of works, that no one might boast.

content: 10 For we are his workmanship, having been created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God has before prepared that we should walk in them.
content_old: 10 For we are his workmanship, having been created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God has before prepared that we should walk in them.

content: 11 Wherefore remember that ye, once nations in the flesh, who are called uncircumcision by that called circumcision in the flesh done with the hand;
content_old: 11 Wherefore remember that ye, once nations in the flesh, who are called uncircumcision by that called circumcision in the flesh done with the hand;

content: 12 that ye were at that time without Christ, aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers to the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world:
content_old: 12 that ye were at that time without Christ, aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers to the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world:

content: 13 but now in Christ Jesus ye who once were afar off are become nigh by the blood of the Christ.
content_old: 13 but now in Christ Jesus ye who once were afar off are become nigh by the blood of the Christ.

content: 14 For he is our peace, who has made both one, and has broken down the middle wall of enclosure,
content_old: 14 For he is our peace, who has made both one, and has broken down the middle wall of enclosure,

content: 15 having annulled the enmity in his flesh, the law of commandments in ordinances, that he might form the two in himself into one new man, making peace;
content_old: 15 having annulled the enmity in his flesh, the law of commandments in ordinances, that he might form the two in himself into one new man, making peace;

content: 16 and might reconcile both in one body to God by the cross, having by it slain the enmity;
content_old: 16 and might reconcile both in one body to God by the cross, having by it slain the enmity;

content: 17 and, coming, he has preached the glad tidings of peace to you who were afar off, and the glad tidings of peace to those who were nigh.
content_old: 17 and, coming, he has preached the glad tidings of peace to you who were afar off, and the glad tidings of peace to those who were nigh.

content: 18 For through him we have both access by one Spirit to the Father.
content_old: 18 For through him we have both access by one Spirit to the Father.

content: 19 So then ye are no longer strangers and foreigners, but ye are fellow-citizens of the saints, and of the household of God,
content_old: 19 So then ye are no longer strangers and foreigners, but ye are fellow-citizens of the saints, and of the household of God,

content: 20 being built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the corner-stone,
content_old: 20 being built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the corner-stone,

content: 21 in whom all the building fitted together increases to a holy temple in the Lord;
content_old: 21 in whom all the building fitted together increases to a holy temple in the Lord;

content: 1 For this reason I Paul, prisoner of the Christ Jesus for you nations,
content_old: 1 For this reason I Paul, prisoner of the Christ Jesus for you nations,

content: 2 (if indeed ye have heard of the administration of the grace of God which has been given to me towards you,
content_old: 2 (if indeed ye have heard of the administration of the grace of God which has been given to me towards you,

content: 3 that by revelation the mystery has been made known to me, (according as I have written before briefly,
content_old: 3 that by revelation the mystery has been made known to me, (according as I have written before briefly,

content: 4 by which, in reading it, ye can understand my intelligence in the mystery of the Christ,)
content_old: 4 by which, in reading it, ye can understand my intelligence in the mystery of the Christ,)

content: 5 which in other generations has not been made known to the sons of men, as it has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets in the power of the Spirit,
content_old: 5 which in other generations has not been made known to the sons of men, as it has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets in the power of the Spirit,

content: 6 that they who are of the nations should be joint heirs, and a joint body, and joint partakers of his promise in Christ Jesus by the glad tidings;
content_old: 6 that they who are of the nations should be joint heirs, and a joint body, and joint partakers of his promise in Christ Jesus by the glad tidings;

content: 7 of which I am become minister according to the gift of the grace of God given to me, according to the working of his power.
content_old: 7 of which I am become minister according to the gift of the grace of God given to me, according to the working of his power.

content: 8 To me, less than the least of all saints, has this grace been given, to announce among the nations the glad tidings of the unsearchable riches of the Christ,
content_old: 8 To me, less than the least of all saints, has this grace been given, to announce among the nations the glad tidings of the unsearchable riches of the Christ,

content: 9 and to enlighten all with the knowledge of what is the administration of the mystery hidden throughout the ages in God, who has created all things,
content_old: 9 and to enlighten all with the knowledge of what is the administration of the mystery hidden throughout the ages in God, who has created all things,

content: 10 in order that now to the principalities and authorities in the heavenlies might be made known through the assembly the all-various wisdom of God,
content_old: 10 in order that now to the principalities and authorities in the heavenlies might be made known through the assembly the all-various wisdom of God,

content: 11 according to the purpose of the ages, which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord,
content_old: 11 according to the purpose of the ages, which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord,

content: 12 in whom we have boldness and access in confidence by the faith of him.
content_old: 12 in whom we have boldness and access in confidence by the faith of him.

content: 13 Wherefore I beseech you not to faint through my tribulations for you, which is your glory.
content_old: 13 Wherefore I beseech you not to faint through my tribulations for you, which is your glory.

content: 14 For this reason I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,
content_old: 14 For this reason I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

content: 15 of whom every family in the heavens and on earth is named,
content_old: 15 of whom every family in the heavens and on earth is named,

content: 16 in order that he may give you according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with power by his Spirit in the inner man;
content_old: 16 in order that he may give you according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with power by his Spirit in the inner man;

content: 17 that the Christ may dwell, through faith, in your hearts, being rooted and founded in love,
content_old: 17 that the Christ may dwell, through faith, in your hearts, being rooted and founded in love,

content: 18 in order that ye may be fully able to apprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and depth and height;
content_old: 18 in order that ye may be fully able to apprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and depth and height;

content: 19 and to know the love of the Christ which surpasses knowledge; that ye may be filled even to all the fulness of God.
content_old: 19 and to know the love of the Christ which surpasses knowledge; that ye may be filled even to all the fulness of God.

content: 20 But to him that is able to do far exceedingly above all which we ask or think, according to the power which works in us,
content_old: 20 But to him that is able to do far exceedingly above all which we ask or think, according to the power which works in us,

content: 1 I, the prisoner in the Lord, exhort you therefore to walk worthy of the calling wherewith ye have been called,
content_old: 1 I, the prisoner in the Lord, exhort you therefore to walk worthy of the calling wherewith ye have been called,

content: 2 with all lowliness and meekness, with long-suffering, bearing with one another in love;
content_old: 2 with all lowliness and meekness, with long-suffering, bearing with one another in love;

content: 3 using diligence to keep the unity of the Spirit in the uniting bond of peace.
content_old: 3 using diligence to keep the unity of the Spirit in the uniting bond of peace.

content: 4 There is one body and one Spirit, as ye have been also called in one hope of your calling;
content_old: 4 There is one body and one Spirit, as ye have been also called in one hope of your calling;

content: 5 one Lord, one faith, one baptism;
content_old: 5 one Lord, one faith, one baptism;

content: 6 one God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in us all.
content_old: 6 one God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in us all.

content: 7 But to each one of us has been given grace according to the measure of the gift of the Christ.
content_old: 7 But to each one of us has been given grace according to the measure of the gift of the Christ.

content: 8 Wherefore he says, Having ascended up on high, he has led captivity captive, and has given gifts to men.
content_old: 8 Wherefore he says, Having ascended up on high, he has led captivity captive, and has given gifts to men.

content: 9 But that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended into the lower parts of the earth?
content_old: 9 But that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended into the lower parts of the earth?

content: 10 He that descended is the same who has also ascended up above all the heavens, that he might fill all things;
content_old: 10 He that descended is the same who has also ascended up above all the heavens, that he might fill all things;

content: 11 and he has given some apostles, and some prophets, and some evangelists, and some shepherds and teachers,
content_old: 11 and he has given some apostles, and some prophets, and some evangelists, and some shepherds and teachers,

content: 12 for the perfecting of the saints; with a view to the work of the ministry, with a view to the edifying of the body of Christ;
content_old: 12 for the perfecting of the saints; with a view to the work of the ministry, with a view to the edifying of the body of Christ;

content: 13 until we all arrive at the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Son of God, at the full-grown man, at the measure of the stature of the fulness of the Christ;
content_old: 13 until we all arrive at the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Son of God, at the full-grown man, at the measure of the stature of the fulness of the Christ;

content: 14 in order that we may be no longer babes, tossed and carried about by every wind of that teaching which is in the sleight of men, in unprincipled cunning with a view to systematized error;
content_old: 14 in order that we may be no longer babes, tossed and carried about by every wind of that teaching which is in the sleight of men, in unprincipled cunning with a view to systematized error;

content: 15 but, holding the truth in love, we may grow up to him in all things, who is the head, the Christ:
content_old: 15 but, holding the truth in love, we may grow up to him in all things, who is the head, the Christ:

content: 16 from whom the whole body, fitted together, and connected by every joint of supply, according to the working in its measure of each one part, works for itself the increase of the body to its self-building up in love.
content_old: 16 from whom the whole body, fitted together, and connected by every joint of supply, according to the working in its measure of each one part, works for itself the increase of the body to its self-building up in love.

content: 17 This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye should no longer walk as the rest of the nations walk in the vanity of their mind,
content_old: 17 This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye should no longer walk as the rest of the nations walk in the vanity of their mind,

content: 18 being darkened in understanding, estranged from the life of God by reason of the ignorance which is in them, by reason of the hardness of their hearts,
content_old: 18 being darkened in understanding, estranged from the life of God by reason of the ignorance which is in them, by reason of the hardness of their hearts,

content: 19 who having cast off all feeling, have given themselves up to lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greedy unsatisfied lust.
content_old: 19 who having cast off all feeling, have given themselves up to lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greedy unsatisfied lust.

content: 20 But ye have not thus learnt the Christ,
content_old: 20 But ye have not thus learnt the Christ,

content: 21 if ye have heard him and been instructed in him according as the truth is in Jesus;
content_old: 21 if ye have heard him and been instructed in him according as the truth is in Jesus;

content: 22 namely your having put off according to the former conversation the old man which corrupts itself according to the deceitful lusts;
content_old: 22 namely your having put off according to the former conversation the old man which corrupts itself according to the deceitful lusts;

content: 23 and being renewed in the spirit of your mind;
content_old: 23 and being renewed in the spirit of your mind;

content: 24 and your having put on the new man, which according to God is created in truthful righteousness and holiness.
content_old: 24 and your having put on the new man, which according to God is created in truthful righteousness and holiness.

content: 25 Wherefore, having put off falsehood, speak truth every one with his neighbour, because we are members one of another.
content_old: 25 Wherefore, having put off falsehood, speak truth every one with his neighbour, because we are members one of another.

content: 26 Be angry, and do not sin; let not the sun set upon your wrath,
content_old: 26 Be angry, and do not sin; let not the sun set upon your wrath,

content: 27 neither give room for the devil.
content_old: 27 neither give room for the devil.

content: 28 Let the stealer steal no more, but rather let him toil, working what is honest with his hands, that he may have to distribute to him that has need.
content_old: 28 Let the stealer steal no more, but rather let him toil, working what is honest with his hands, that he may have to distribute to him that has need.

content: 29 Let no corrupt word go out of your mouth, but if there be any good one for needful edification, that it may give grace to those that hear it.
content_old: 29 Let no corrupt word go out of your mouth, but if there be any good one for needful edification, that it may give grace to those that hear it.

content: 30 And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, with which ye have been sealed for the day of redemption.
content_old: 30 And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, with which ye have been sealed for the day of redemption.

content: 31 Let all bitterness, and heat of passion, and wrath, and clamour, and injurious language, be removed from you, with all malice;
content_old: 31 Let all bitterness, and heat of passion, and wrath, and clamour, and injurious language, be removed from you, with all malice;

content: 1 Be ye therefore imitators of God, as beloved children,
content_old: 1 Be ye therefore imitators of God, as beloved children,

content: 2 and walk in love, even as the Christ loved us, and delivered himself up for us, an offering and sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling savour.
content_old: 2 and walk in love, even as the Christ loved us, and delivered himself up for us, an offering and sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling savour.

content: 3 But fornication and all uncleanness or unbridled lust, let it not be even named among you, as it becomes saints;
content_old: 3 But fornication and all uncleanness or unbridled lust, let it not be even named among you, as it becomes saints;

content: 4 and filthiness and foolish talking, or jesting, which are not convenient; but rather thanksgiving.
content_old: 4 and filthiness and foolish talking, or jesting, which are not convenient; but rather thanksgiving.

content: 5 For this ye are well informed of, knowing that no fornicator, or unclean person, or person of unbridled lust, who is an idolater, has inheritance in the kingdom of the Christ and God.
content_old: 5 For this ye are well informed of, knowing that no fornicator, or unclean person, or person of unbridled lust, who is an idolater, has inheritance in the kingdom of the Christ and God.

content: 6 Let no one deceive you with vain words, for on account of these things the wrath of God comes upon the sons of disobedience.
content_old: 6 Let no one deceive you with vain words, for on account of these things the wrath of God comes upon the sons of disobedience.

content: 7 Be not ye therefore fellow-partakers with them;
content_old: 7 Be not ye therefore fellow-partakers with them;

content: 8 for ye were once darkness, but now light in the Lord; walk as children of light,
content_old: 8 for ye were once darkness, but now light in the Lord; walk as children of light,

content: 9 (for the fruit of the light is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,)
content_old: 9 (for the fruit of the light is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,)

content: 10 proving what is agreeable to the Lord;
content_old: 10 proving what is agreeable to the Lord;

content: 11 and do not have fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather also reprove them,
content_old: 11 and do not have fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather also reprove them,

content: 12 for the things that are done by them in secret it is shameful even to say.
content_old: 12 for the things that are done by them in secret it is shameful even to say.

content: 13 But all things having their true character exposed by the light are made manifest; for that which makes everything manifest is light.
content_old: 13 But all things having their true character exposed by the light are made manifest; for that which makes everything manifest is light.

content: 14 Wherefore he says, Wake up, thou that sleepest, and arise up from among the dead, and the Christ shall shine upon thee.
content_old: 14 Wherefore he says, Wake up, thou that sleepest, and arise up from among the dead, and the Christ shall shine upon thee.

content: 15 See therefore how ye walk carefully, not as unwise but as wise,
content_old: 15 See therefore how ye walk carefully, not as unwise but as wise,

content: 16 redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
content_old: 16 redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

content: 17 For this reason be not foolish, but understanding what is the will of the Lord.
content_old: 17 For this reason be not foolish, but understanding what is the will of the Lord.

content: 18 And be not drunk with wine, in which is debauchery; but be filled with the Spirit,
content_old: 18 And be not drunk with wine, in which is debauchery; but be filled with the Spirit,

content: 19 speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and chanting with your heart to the Lord;
content_old: 19 speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and chanting with your heart to the Lord;

content: 20 giving thanks at all times for all things to him who is God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ,
content_old: 20 giving thanks at all times for all things to him who is God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ,

content: 21 submitting yourselves to one another in the fear of Christ.
content_old: 21 submitting yourselves to one another in the fear of Christ.

content: 22 Wives, submit yourselves to your own husbands, as to the Lord,
content_old: 22 Wives, submit yourselves to your own husbands, as to the Lord,

content: 23 for a husband is head of the wife, as also the Christ is head of the assembly. He is Saviour of the body.
content_old: 23 for a husband is head of the wife, as also the Christ is head of the assembly. He is Saviour of the body.

content: 24 But even as the assembly is subjected to the Christ, so also wives to their own husbands in everything.
content_old: 24 But even as the assembly is subjected to the Christ, so also wives to their own husbands in everything.

content: 25 Husbands, love your own wives, even as the Christ also loved the assembly, and has delivered himself up for it,
content_old: 25 Husbands, love your own wives, even as the Christ also loved the assembly, and has delivered himself up for it,

content: 26 in order that he might sanctify it, purifying it by the washing of water by the word,
content_old: 26 in order that he might sanctify it, purifying it by the washing of water by the word,

content: 27 that he might present the assembly to himself glorious, having no spot, or wrinkle, or any of such things; but that it might be holy and blameless.
content_old: 27 that he might present the assembly to himself glorious, having no spot, or wrinkle, or any of such things; but that it might be holy and blameless.

content: 28 So ought men also to love their own wives as their own bodies: he that loves his own wife loves himself.
content_old: 28 So ought men also to love their own wives as their own bodies: he that loves his own wife loves himself.

content: 29 For no one has ever hated his own flesh, but nourishes and cherishes it, even as also the Christ the assembly:
content_old: 29 For no one has ever hated his own flesh, but nourishes and cherishes it, even as also the Christ the assembly:

content: 30 for we are members of his body; we are of his flesh, and of his bones.
content_old: 30 for we are members of his body; we are of his flesh, and of his bones.

content: 31 Because of this a man shall leave his father and mother, and shall be united to his wife, and the two shall be one flesh.
content_old: 31 Because of this a man shall leave his father and mother, and shall be united to his wife, and the two shall be one flesh.

content: 32 This mystery is great, but I speak as to Christ, and as to the assembly.
content_old: 32 This mystery is great, but I speak as to Christ, and as to the assembly.

content: 1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is just.
content_old: 1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is just.

content: 2 Honour thy father and thy mother, which is the first commandment with a promise,
content_old: 2 Honour thy father and thy mother, which is the first commandment with a promise,

content: 3 that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest be long-lived on the earth.
content_old: 3 that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest be long-lived on the earth.

content: 4 And ye fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and admonition of the Lord.
content_old: 4 And ye fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and admonition of the Lord.

content: 5 Bondmen, obey masters according to flesh, with fear and trembling, in simplicity of your heart as to the Christ;
content_old: 5 Bondmen, obey masters according to flesh, with fear and trembling, in simplicity of your heart as to the Christ;

content: 6 not with eye-service as men-pleasers; but as bondmen of Christ, doing the will of God from the soul,
content_old: 6 not with eye-service as men-pleasers; but as bondmen of Christ, doing the will of God from the soul,

content: 7 serving with good will as to the Lord, and not to men;
content_old: 7 serving with good will as to the Lord, and not to men;

content: 8 knowing that whatever good each shall do, this he shall receive of the Lord, whether bond or free.
content_old: 8 knowing that whatever good each shall do, this he shall receive of the Lord, whether bond or free.

content: 9 And, masters, do the same things towards them, giving up threatening, knowing that both their and your Master is in heaven, and there is no acceptance of persons with him.
content_old: 9 And, masters, do the same things towards them, giving up threatening, knowing that both their and your Master is in heaven, and there is no acceptance of persons with him.

content: 10 For the rest, brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the might of his strength.
content_old: 10 For the rest, brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the might of his strength.

content: 11 Put on the panoply of God, that ye may be able to stand against the artifices of the devil:
content_old: 11 Put on the panoply of God, that ye may be able to stand against the artifices of the devil:

content: 12 because our struggle is not against blood and flesh, but against principalities, against authorities, against the universal lords of this darkness, against spiritual power of wickedness in the heavenlies.
content_old: 12 because our struggle is not against blood and flesh, but against principalities, against authorities, against the universal lords of this darkness, against spiritual power of wickedness in the heavenlies.

content: 13 For this reason take to you the panoply of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and, having accomplished all things, to stand.
content_old: 13 For this reason take to you the panoply of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and, having accomplished all things, to stand.

content: 14 Stand therefore, having girt about your loins with truth, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,
content_old: 14 Stand therefore, having girt about your loins with truth, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,

content: 15 and shod your feet with the preparation of the glad tidings of peace:
content_old: 15 and shod your feet with the preparation of the glad tidings of peace:

content: 16 besides all these, having taken the shield of faith with which ye will be able to quench all the inflamed darts of the wicked one.
content_old: 16 besides all these, having taken the shield of faith with which ye will be able to quench all the inflamed darts of the wicked one.

content: 17 Have also the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is God’s word;
content_old: 17 Have also the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is God’s word;

content: 18 praying at all seasons, with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching unto this very thing with all perseverance and supplication for all the saints;
content_old: 18 praying at all seasons, with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching unto this very thing with all perseverance and supplication for all the saints;

content: 19 and for me in order that utterance may be given to me in the opening of my mouth to make known with boldness the mystery of the glad tidings,
content_old: 19 and for me in order that utterance may be given to me in the opening of my mouth to make known with boldness the mystery of the glad tidings,

content: 20 for which I am an ambassador bound with a chain, that I may be bold in it as I ought to speak.
content_old: 20 for which I am an ambassador bound with a chain, that I may be bold in it as I ought to speak.

content: 21 But in order that ye also may know what concerns me, how I am getting on, Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make all things known to you;
content_old: 21 But in order that ye also may know what concerns me, how I am getting on, Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make all things known to you;

content: 22 whom I have sent to you for this very thing, that ye may know of our affairs and that he may encourage your hearts.
content_old: 22 whom I have sent to you for this very thing, that ye may know of our affairs and that he may encourage your hearts.

content: 23 Peace to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 23 Peace to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
